scripts.test: npm run test:compile && npm run test:functions
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:compile:ci && npm run test:functions
scripts.test:compile: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esnext.json && tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && tsc -p tsconfig.noNullChecks.json
scripts.test:compile:ci: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esnext.json && tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && tsc -p tsconfig.noNullChecks.json
